description: One sentient potato, wearing a fedora and holding a vegetable peeler like a weapon, confronts another sentient potato on a sidewalk. The second potato stands with its hands raised in surrender, reacting with distress. The scene creates dark humor through the absurd scenario of a potato being threatened with the very tool used in its preparation. The peeler, typically used for removing a potato's skin, becomes an instrument of intimidation in this surreal encounter.
caption: "Get 'em up there!"
